name: Bundesverband Öffentliche Dienstleistungen e.V.
goal: BVOED as the German Section of CEEP gathers Enterprises and organisations from Germany, both public and private, which are public employers or Providers of Services of General interest.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Activities concerning infrastructures of general interest and public services as water, waste, energy or public Transport.
Social Dialogue.
